item.title: Stock to buy: Anand Rathi predicts ArisInfra Solutions' shares to rise 15% in one month. Here's why

review.headline_rewrite: Stock to buy: Anand Rathi predicts ArisInfra Solutions' shares to rise 15% in one month. Here's why
bullets: ArisInfra Solutions Ltd: Buy at ₹144–142; Target Price at ₹164; Stop Loss at ₹132 (on a closing basis).
To manage risk effectively, a closing basis stop-loss at 132 is recommended.
According to the data collected from the BSE website, the shares of the firm hit their 52-week high level at ₹209.10 on 25 June
